title: FS - T206 Matty white cap PSA 1 - nice card.

posts.post_title: FS - T206 Matty white cap PSA 1 - nice card.
posts.post_content:
Matty White Cap PSA 1 - Sold - Front vertical wrinkle and some paper loss that does not affect text - Beautiful card.

Prices delivered/insured PP/FF. Thanks for looking

Bump for price drop. Thanks for looking.
New month, new price. Thanks for your consideration.
